title: Skyrocketing Valuation Increases Appetite for Private Investments
description: Appetite for private growth equity picks up as startups stay private longer with skyrocketing valuations. Peter Singlehurst, head of private companies at Baillie Gifford, discusses the opportunities for investors with Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Tech." (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Appetite for private growth equity picks up as startups stay private longer with skyrocketing valuations. Peter Singlehurst, head of private companies at Baillie Gifford, discusses the opportunities for investors with Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Tech." (Source: Bloomberg)
